hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Ganon's Castle Small Key# and #the Kokiri Sword#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #3# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Water Temple Small Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Lens of Truth#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: @ tries to read the Gossip Stone...^${12 48 06}but he's standing on the wrong side of it!

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that beating Bongo Bongo quickly requires an even tempo.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.
